Frequently Asked Questions

Find quick answers to most frequently asked questions about ConnectPOS. Check out our FAQs below

You can choose the topic and find the quick answers to your

  • ConnectPOS Features

    • ConnectPOS Features

    1Which devices does X-POS work on?

    2Is the web-based X-POS compatible with MAC?

    X-POS can work on both MACs and PCs. To provide you with more info, the X-POS is a web application so its features/functionalities are not limited by devices (Macs or PCs) providing you are using a supported web browser (Chrome, FireFox and Safari are recommended).

    3Do web-based X-POS and iPad app X-POS work together?

    4I have more than one store, will X-POS work for me?

    5Can I use X-POS if I have multiple cash registers in use at the same time?

    6I don’t have a reliable Internet connection, can I still make X-POS work for me?

    7Can I quickly create a product that hasn't existed in my online store to check out?

    8 Does X-POS support scanning barcodes?

    9Does X-POS support giftcards and reward points?

    10Can I customize the software?
